summary:
Services - PirateCash staking Pool, Pirate Place, Desktop Wallet, Shop of souvenirs, RaspiNode, Decentralized exchange

 Block Explorer - Web-based, universal blockchain explorer, featuring a REST API for devs

 PirateCash SDN - Our goal to using the Pirate Masternodes as Software-defined networking (SDN). This technology will provide good quality of service and it will be High Availability (HA), flexible and DDoS resistant network.

 The Pirate Place services - Treasure map, Enigma code, Pirates art, Wallet of PirateCash / Portfolio, The Loongoliers, The ships

 Roadmap - Start main net 2018-11-03
